traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the gremlin has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The fuath gremlin can only breathe underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fuath gremlin makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Congeal Water (1/day)
actions.desc: One creature of the fuath gremlin’s choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be coated with a thick, viscous coating of clinging watery fluid for 1 minute. While coated with this substance, the target is restrained and must hold its breath to keep from drowning (reference the SRD for Suffocating rules). The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
